mapper.select: SELECT k.PLANNER_NO , k.MEM_NO , k.PLANNER_BA_CODE , k.TITLE , (select SAVE_NAME||'.'||EXTENSION from TBL_COMMON_FILE where FILE_NO=k.attach_file) attach_file , k.MEMO , k.START_DATE , k.END_DATE , k.REG_DATE , k.USE_YN ,(select count(*) from tbl_Common_reply where item_no=k.planner_no and type_code='Z1001') reply_Count ,(select mem_name from tbl_member where mem_no=k.mem_no) mem_name FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, f.* FROM (SELECT t.* FROM tbl_planner t WHERE t.USE_YN='Y0002' ORDER BY t.reg_date DESC )f )k WHERE k.rnum>=1 AND k.rnum <=3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , RTABLE.* FROM (SELECT SP.SPOT_NO , SP.MEM_NO , SP.COUNTRY_CODE , (select code_name from TBL_COMMON_CODE where CODE=SP.COUNTRY_CODE) AS COUNTRY_NAME , SP.CITY_CODE , (select code_name from TBL_COMMON_CODE where CODE=SP.CITY_CODE) AS CITY_NAME , SP.SPOT_NAME , SP.SPOT_TYPE_CODE , (select code_name from TBL_COMMON_CODE where CODE=SP.SPOT_TYPE_CODE) AS SPOT_TYPE_NAME , SP.MEM_LEVEL_CODE , SP.SPOT_NOTE , (select SAVE_NAME||'.'||EXTENSION from TBL_COMMON_FILE where FILE_NO=replace(SP.ATTACH_FILE,',','')) AS ATTACH_FILE , SP.SPOT_ADDR , SP.SPOT_LAT , SP.SPOT_LONG , SP.TOTAL_STAR_SCORE , SP.COUNT_STAR_SCORE , SP.OPEN_API_SEQ , SP.SPOT_REGDATE , ROUND( NVL((SP.TOTAL_STAR_SCORE)/DECODE((SP.COUNT_STAR_SCORE),0, NULL,(SP.COUNT_STAR_SCORE)), 0), 1) AS STAR_SCORE FROM TBL_SPOT SP ORDER BY STAR_SCORE DESC ,SP.TOTAL_STAR_SCORE DESC )RTABLE )TOTALTABLE WHERE RNUM>=1 AND RNUM<=6

SELECT PLANNER_NO , MEM_NO , PLANNER_BA_CODE , TITLE , ATTACH_FILE , MEMO , START_DATE , END_DATE , REG_DATE , USE_YN FROM TBL_PLANNER WHERE PLANNER_NO IN (SELECT AA.planner_no FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum , planner_no FROM TBL_ADMIN_MAIN_SETTING WHERE SETTING_SPOT_CODE='M8883' AND SETTING_TYPE_CODE='M9992' AND USE_YN='Y0001' ORDER BY SETTING_DATE DESC )AA WHERE AA.rnum>=1 AND AA.rnum<=13 )
